## Checklist

- [ ] Follows [CODE_STANDARDS.md](docs/pm-notes/CODE_STANDARDS.md)
- [ ] JSDoc comments added to all exported functions
- [ ] No console.logs committed
- [ ] No `any` types used
- [ ] Tested locally end-to-end
- [ ] Loading states handled
- [ ] Error states handled
- [ ] Mobile responsiveness checked
- [ ] No unnecessary files created
- [ ] Jira ticket referenced (if applicable)
- [ ] requireAuth() first in all Server Actions
- [ ] Zod validation before database calls
- [ ] userId from session, never from client
